Ascending.description: To list jobs in chronological order by the date and time that they were submitted, enter true. To list jobs in reverse chronological order, enter false.

PageToken.description: When Elastic Transcoder returns more than one page of results, use pageToken in subsequent GET requests to get each successive page of results.

Status.description: To get information about all of the jobs associated with the current AWS account that have a given status, specify the following status: Submitted, Progressing, Complete, Canceled, or Error.
